tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ***** ** *** ** *** ********* ******* ** *** *****

She will Genuinely try her best for Normal Delivery, except some critical condition if any.

Also She is Friendly and skilled on her profession.

up to 5th month i had visited two different doctors in Laxmi Maternity and AMS Hospital at adyar. In both the places i am not satisfied with doctors care and treatment.

After 5 th month only we found Dr. Rukkayal through google and practo reviews and visited for pregnancy checkup.

At very first we asked some clarifications before consulting, she is polite and answered for all our queries clearly. 

Then only we decided to continue for check-up further. Before met her (upto 5 months) , I was confused and tensed whether i am visiting the correct doctor

to my wife. After visiting her, I was completely Free from pressure and believed her 100%. 

She will explain the things clearly and guide you for Normal delivery always. My wife also Delivered the baby in Normal.

Also very reasonable fees for checkup at Mylapore Golden Clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Rukkayal is a very friendly and trustworthy doc.

My mother had to do hysterectomy so we have been seeing quite a few doctors in and out for years but we were not satisfied by the visit. We first came to know Rukkayal doc through another doc from Orthomed ,her first visit was very warm and kind she explained everything very clearly I had no second thoughts ,we proceeded with hysterectomy surgery. 
I will not forget, when doc holded my hand before my moms surgery it made me feel calm ,it took 4hours to complete the surgery because it's a little challenging surgery since my mom has tummy fat and diabetes. From the beginning till now doc is very consistent when it comes to caring patient.  Thank you so much doc I have no more words to say other than thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: During lockdown period i took my wife here for pregnecny checkup. After the intial visit we are very satisfied and continued our checkup regularly. Now i got a baby girl and doctor took good care till my baby is out. I need to appreiciate the way doctor guided us and provided support during hard hours. Even for labour doctor came to hospital early morning 3 clock and took good care of my wife and baby till she is out to the world in normal delivery. Thank you very much Rukkayl doctor. I recommend people  who want to get best doctor during pregnancy is her. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you for your wonderful care"before and during my wife pregnancy you gave a lovely  combination of professionalism and caring and concerns make everything better. "After seeing so many doctors we finally came upon dr: Rukkayal Fathima. She understood my problem right at the start itself. She guided my treatment in the right way and now the treatment has worked. She is always accessible all the time. She has eventually  became  one in our family by her friendliness and care .I would like to say again thank you maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Rukkayal for our regular pregnancy chek up and delivery. *** ** *** ***** ******* **** ** **** She is very friendly when talking to patients and adresses every concern with utmost care. Even during the time of delivery she handled things with calm and professionalism. Not just Dr. Rukkayal, but her entire team is fantastic. They provided fantastic care before amd after delivery. We were very fortunate and happy we had Dr. Rukkayal as our gynecologist and Be Well hospitals for our care. We would certainly recommend Dr. Rukkayal and her team for pregnancy and other gynec consulting.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Few months back I got UTI problem. My colleague referred me about Dr.Rukkayal Fathima. When I visited her for a first time, She treated me very kindly. She gave me a clear explanation about UTI problem and done USG. I got better improvement within a week but due to my low immunity level, again I got that same problem after a month. On that time I had consulted Dr over the phone, she prescribed me some other medicines and I got recovered. I felt comfortable & satisfied with her consultation. Easy to approach and patient friendly doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I'm very satisfied with treatment. Dr. Rukkayal mam was very nice and kind she explaining the treatment very well.all the sisters are very polite and kind. Services was very good. Infrastructure was neet and clean. Packages are affordable. **** ******** ** *** *******. good experience with Mylapore-hive team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,
review:
To Start with " Highly recommended for fertility treatment & Normal delivery "
I will highly recommend Dr.Rukkayal for fertility issues and pregnancy check up. During lockdown period we received an immense support from her . Mam is very friendly & polite .Madam will explain each and every step in detail. Without madam effort I wouldn‚Äôt have vaginal delivery. She was with me through out the labor pampering me and made me feel comfortable during delivery. Also to be precise madam will be available on call at any time. Also madam will try utmost for normal delivery. We recommend her for any fertilely / delivery treatments. 

Blessed with a boy baby & we are fine now. Thanks mam for your support .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After seeing so many doctors we finally came upon dr. Rukkayal Fathima based on a suggestion made by a family friend. She understood my problem right at the start itself. She guided my treatment in the right way and now the treatment  has worked. A dream for 4 years! 
I strongly recommend her for any issues. No false hopes, no unneccessary procedures but everything will happen eventually.  She cares about the patient and not very much about the money. She was always accessible all the time. She will eventually become one in our family by her friendliness and care she provides with a smile on her face always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,
review: Mam is very caring and friendly....i went along with my co- sis for her pregnancy checkup and i started liking her on seeing her way of treating patients....not at all seen such a doctor like this****** ** *** ************ ** ******she will be busy for 24 hours in a day...but she will answer our call...when she is unable to answer...she will msg us and for sure she will call us...i suggest all my well wishers to meet doctor for their medical issues....not only gynocological issues i will get advice for all my medical issues...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is such a caring and friendly doctor who had more patience than me during my delivery. She was listening to me throughout my labor which was induced and was explaining the issues/status at every stage. I was no more co-operative during the labor but she was maintaining her patience even at that time and motivating for NVD. Even after delivery she listens to our health issues and supports through mobile. My only worry is that I missed her guidance from the beginning of my pregnancy since I came to know about her while nearing my delivery. She doesn't makes the patient panic for any issues and makes us feel comfortable. *** ** *** **** ************* * **** *** ** *** *** I would strongly recommend her for my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had pcod issues and so the conception was a problem.. After consulting her, she did laproscopic surgery. I was in Mumbai but still she gave offline support and helped me a lot to conceive immediately after the surgery. I was conceived with twins.. She is such a caring and humble doctor and explains the root cause of the problems and treats it unlike some doctors who really wastes our time and money going roundabout. She kept monitoring me regularly throughout the pregnancy and made me comfortable all through my term. Her level of patience is commendable.. Her motive is not money but the well being of the patients. I blindly recommend her for anyone bcoz she is trustworthy..
